name: Derplang.org
body:
## Derp
### The Programming language we wished compiled.

#### Features
* The outermost parentheses is always dropped.
```php
if (foo($bar) { // work ... }
```
* The penultimate comma is optional. The last is required.
```javascript
var myList = {
  'one',
  'two',
  'three'
  'four',
};
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
